pkgmetadata.longdescription: Update and Manipulate Rd Documentation Objects // Functions for manipulation of Rd objects, including function reprompt() for updating existing Rd documentation for functions, methods and classes, function rebib() for import of references from 'bibtex' files, a macro for importing 'bibtex' references which can be used in Rd files and 'roxygen2' comments and other convenience functions for references.
